*

Ittle Things

Sep 27, 2012

After Gove, a droopy eyed dog he had encountered before, was hatched from the beer can, Montano ran down a brightly lit sidewalk between movie rental stores. A racquet ball slipped out of his pocket and bounced down away from him and into the pond. It floated across to rest peacefully on the embankment on the other side and Montano was filled with happiness.
